dmca.title: Fraud site - www.safemotordeals.com
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Brandon Abbey [mailto:babbey@escrow.com] 
Sent: Friday, April 01, 2005 6:55 PM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; support@theplanet.com; legal@theplanet.com
Cc: ifcc33@ic3.gov; la.ectf.reports@usss.dhs.gov
Subject: Fraud site - www.safemotordeals.com 
Importance: High


It appears you are hosting a fraud site at - www.safemotordeals.com 

 

This notice is provided in accordance with the U.S. Digital Millennium
Copyright Act. The undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com
and its affiliated licensed escrow services provider, Internet Escrow
Services ("IES").  It has been brought to our attention that your company
provides services to a website, www.safemotordeals.com  which is infringing
on Escrow.com's intellectual property rights to the material posted on
Escrow.com (www.Escrow.com <http://www.escrow.com/> ).  

This site claims an affiliation with our companies and has stolen content
from Escrow.com.  Please disable this site immediately.  I have attached
other versions of this site previously hosted by others.

 

Following is a direct link to one of the offending pages of the
www.safemotordeals.com  site,
http://www.safemotordeals.com/index.php?action=terms . Neither Escrow.com
nor IES has any affiliation with  <http://www.safemotordeals.com>
www.safemotordeals.com , and has a good faith belief that use of the
material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright
owner, its agent or the law.  

 

The information contained in this notice is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, this office is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com.  

 

 

 
Brandon W. Abbey
Managing Director
Escrow.com
16275 Laguna Canyon Road
Irvine, CA  92618
Direct - 949-790-5880
Fax - 949-790-5811
